name: Oh No, My Baby! (Garbage Edition)
description:
NOTE: Game is actually downloadable and playable now. I'm an idiot and was just figuring out how to export from Godot last night. I'm sorry to anyone who tried to play but couldn't! It's a ZIP that you'll extract and run the .exe. 

Take to the air as a baby being carried away on a balloon! Friendly clouds will give you a gust of downward wind if you press the space bar, storm clouds will pop the balloon, so avoid them and make your way safely skyward.

This game was created for Trijam#149 -- the theme is flipped. My take on that is flipped gravity, in that you're being pulled upward. It's also a bit of a flipped take on a traditional 2d platformer, in that it's a vertical scroll instead of horizontal.

This is my first game, my first completed Godot project, and my first ever game jam!
